name: Rollin' Sphere
description:
In Rollin' Sphere you play as a sphere that goes around collecting crystals and finishes levels. That's it! It's a short and sweet game with just 3 levels and also happens to be my first game ever. I really hope you enjoy this experience. Please let me know your feedbacks and comments! 

Also, here's a nice challenge for you! Finish completing the entire game and collect all 136 crystals within the game. Upon doing it successfully, take a screenshot of the level select screen and share the photo to rollinspherethegame@gmail.com .  I will add your name in the end credits to the next update in the game. 

Cheers!
